title: Romantic Bouncers
description: A place in the Indian cricket team – a dream for millions of teenagers. Rabin was one amongst them. He has passion and talent, but the odds aren’t always in his favour. The loss of loved ones and constant discouragements thwart him.Meanwhile, danger looms in the form of the most notorious drug cartel in Kolkata run by a vicious Hoariest Bung. Will Rabin dream beyond his destiny and don the Indian jersey? Can the Narcotics Control Bureau apprehend Hoariest Bung?A tale of desire and despair – the struggle of a cricketer behind the glamour of playing the game for a cricket crazed nation.
author: Ram Vignesh
